title.rendered: Apply Now | University of Alberta Application Requirements & Deadlines 2024

content.rendered:
How to Apply for Admission to the University of Alberta, Requirement for Admission in University of Alberta, Steps on How to Apply for Admission to the University of Alberta, Course Requirements, List of Courses Offered in University of Alberta, Canada, Application Fees, Application Start Date

Contents on This Page

Toggle
  • Alberta University Admission requirements, Canada
  • Steps on How to Apply for Admission to the University of Alberta
  • Course Requirements
  • List of Courses Offered in University of Alberta, Canada.

This is to inform the general public that admission into the University of Alberta is open for application online. All interested students seeking to study a course at the University are admonished to use this opportunity to submit applications for admission considerations.

 

 

Before you begin, consider the following headings;

Table of Contents

Requirement for Admission in University of Alberta, Canada

Steps on How to Apply for Admission to the University of Alberta

Course Requirements

List of Courses Offered in University of Alberta, Canada.

Application Fees

Application Start Date

Alberta University Admission requirements, Canada

You are seeking admission into the University of Alberta and I urge you to take these steps into consideration. Before you click the apply button, consider the following documents.

Students applying through High School, consider the availability of

  • Grade 11 and 12 grades
  • High school transcripts.
  • Alberta student number
  • University of Alberta campus choice
  • The program you would like to apply to
  • Method of payment for the application fee (credit card)

 

For Current or Previous University/College Students, consider;

  • Academic history
  • Transcripts (digital copy of high school and post-secondary)
  • University of Alberta campus choice
  • The program you would like to apply to
  • Method of payment for the application fee (credit card)

Steps on How to Apply for Admission to the University of Alberta

Seeking admission to the University of Alberta, U of A is simple and required a simple approach. We present the following ways to gain admission into any course/program of choice.

  1. Go to https://www.ualberta.ca/admissions/undergraduate/admission/index.html?
  2. Get two Program of Choices
  3. Check Admission requirement
  4. Apply for admission, visit: https://apply.ualberta.ca/apply/
  5. Submit Transcript on or before the application deadlines
  6. Check Admission Status by clicking: https://apply.ualberta.ca/account/login?r=https%3a%2f%2fapply.ualberta.ca%2fportal%2fstatus

Course Requirements

To gain admission to any course, students should have;

  1. Five specific Grade 12 subjects
  2. English 30-1 (or the equivalent in your province)
  3. Competitive Average(CA) for faculty/program of choice, based on the required courses for that program.
  4. An adequate level of English Language Proficiency (ELP)
  5. In most cases, Spoken English Proficiency (SEP) is also required, e.g French-language programs require French Language Proficiency.
  6. Another way of submitting ELP grades is through TOEFL and IELTS exam scores.

Checklist of courses below and their course requirement.

List of Courses Offered in University of Alberta, Canada.

You would like to explore all fully accredited courses offered in the University of Alberta, Degree awarded, Faculties, and their various campuses.

The table below presents the courses/programs offered at the University of Alberta.
